mapper.select: select * from LOCKERPOS where LOCKERPOS_Delet='Y' ORDER BY 1 asc

select LOCKERPOS_NO,LOCKERPOS_TYPE,LOCKERPOS_STATUS,LOCKER_NO,LOCKER_STARTDATE,LOCKER_ENDDATE,MEMBER_NAME from LOCKERPOS left join locker using(lockerpos_no) left join member using(member_no) where LOCKERPOS_NO=#{lpno}
select lockerPos_No,lockerPos_Type from LOCKERPOS left join locker using(lockerpos_no) left join member using(member_no) where member_name is null and LOCKERPOS_Delet='Y' ORDER BY 1 asc
select member_no, member_name from member where Member_LockerNo is null
select Locker_registdate, member_name, locker_Status, LockerPos_No from Locker join member using(member_no) where LOCKER_STATUS='Y'
select * from lockerPos where lockerPos_delet='Y' and lockerPos_Type='M'
select * from lockerPos where lockerPos_delet='Y' and lockerPos_Type='F'
